> An JavaScript application that uses a recipe API to fetch recipes filtered by ingredients. 

### ‚ú® [Demo](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/181514863/491751501-ea4adc6f-125f-4903-add9-cff7080c9e8e.mp4?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTgzMDg2MTAsIm5iZiI6MTc1ODMwODMxMCwicGF0aCI6Ii8xODE1MTQ4NjMvNDkxNzUxNTAxLWVhNGFkYzZmLTEyNWYtNDkwMy1hZGQ5LWNmZjcwODBjOWU4ZS5tcDQ_.se1AirroRPyyVobMgwAAD4INJijr8kcBq3Y-n0yB3CU)

## Install

```sh
npm install
```
